name: Card Defender
description:
Welcome to Card Defender! 

A new take on tower defense where you use cards to power up your towers!

Use the gold you collect from killing the wasps to buy different upgrade cards that make your towers stronger.

Upgrades include, Firerate, Damage, Bleeding, Freeze/Slow and cards with combinations. Cards are bought in the upgrade shop and you choose which tier of card you would like to spawn. After you have chosen a random card from that tier will appear and if you can afford it you can buy it! There is a last resort skill in the up grade shop that will kill all enemies if you are about to loose but beware it costs four thousand gold.

Enemies spawn faster and with more health the higher your score so you have to eventually sell the cheap cards in favor of buying the more expensive ones.

Thank you too the very talented creators on itch for the models and sprites!
